metadata.dc:author: Osinaga, E
Lara Baruque, S
Cifuentes de Castro, L
metadata.dc:description: We have studied the levels of sialo-glycoprotein in the serum of Yoshida sarcoma-bearing rats, with the aim of exploring its possible value as a tumour marker and the influence upon it of non-neoplastic factors.
metadata.dc:title: Niveles séricos de sialoglucoproteínas solubles en acido perclórico, en ratas portadoras de sarcoma de Yoshida.
[Serum levels of sialoglycoproteins soluble in perchloric acid in rats with Yoshida's sarcoma].
